titles.title: A bill to reinstate pilots fired or forced to resign because of a COVID-19 vaccine mandate.
A bill to reinstate pilots fired or forced to resign because of a COVID-19 vaccine mandate.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: This bill directs the Federal Aviation Administration to require air carriers to reinstate any pilot who was fired or forced to resign because of a COVID-19 vaccine mandate.
